content: Very challenging but do-able. Love the story. Glitch games are the best.

always happy with glitch games! they are so well made and thought out, and this was no exception. i try to find games similar to theirs, and nothing even comes close. if i didn't have other financial responsibilities, i would gladly give them every dollar i make just so i can play more of their games.
Playing all Glitch games now. Good as always. Glitch is king of the genre. Especially with more than fair priced games without ads.

Fun but really a pita having to avoid clicking on the button that takes my phone to the home screen whenever clicking the right arrow. Solved it by only using the left arrow to traverse the room. Believe this was mentioned by another Samsung user. Am using a Note 10+ if that info is helpful.
Excellent. Pretty difficult but enjoyable.

Love the game like all of your games however im still a lil confused on some parts.but i could never get the toys to open the door for me i received my brothers letter and tried the door but still not open either way loved the story and the game thanks for what you do

I like this game and was really enjoying it but on my Android phone I could not use the look/move right function. For some reason the exit the game bar never "slept" on my phone so moving right meant I exited the game every time. If this bug is fixed I would happily play it again!
replyContent:
Hi Mandy,

The "right" arrow shouldn't be over the top of the android menu bar. Can you take a screenshot and email it in so we can look into it? Thanks!

content: And I am a big fan of Glitch! (Spoilers ahead) There are puzzles that are so difficult yet u say "Aahhhh I should have got that one." Forever Lost 1 and 2, All that remains and Forgotten room are examples of the best puzzle games ever made. Then there are puzzles that make u say "What? Why would anyone think of that?". The kind that are difficult and dont quite add up logically. Forever Lost 3 and Short tale are sadly examples of some of the worst work of Glitch. Still a Glitch fan forever.

Yes, 4 starts this time, sorry I'm your greatest fan, but the very last puzzle - I just don't understand how it can be in your games. Spoiler- I understand that the curved symbols on the train should resemble the English alphabet, but honestly they don't. Im not sure, it might work for English speaking part of the world, but it definitely doesn't work for other people. Even after I completed the puzzle I hardly see the word. Definitely I would never solve it. 1st time had to use walkthrough- sad
replyContent: Sorry to hear that! We try to balance our puzzles but it's hard and sometimes things slip through the net.

content: Surprisingly difficult but not frustrating. Some puzzles were a little obscure but the storyline was cute and deeper then you think. Good job. Enjoyed it immensely.
replyContent: Glad you liked it and thank you for playing!

content: AMAZING story and puzzles. Need headache tablets after playing though😉😉
replyContent: Glad you liked it! Haha sorry about the headache!

content: Amazing game! I have played almost every game by Glitch games and id almost say this was better then the Forever Lost series! Its very long amd detailed especially for the low price! I used the walkthrough casually but if youre committed to finishing it without a walk thru its possible especially if you have some time invested in it. This game was so great that im now completly convinced i need to purchase all of the other Glitch Games and i CANT WAIT for feb 12 for Veritas! Thank you!
replyContent: Thanks for playing and so glad to hear you liked it so much! Not long to Veritas now :-)

content: Great puzzle adventure. It takes thought, but all the mysteries are solvable.
replyContent: Glad you liked it! Please check out our other games as they are all first-person room escape / adventure games.

content: Amazing game one of the best puzzle game.
replyContent: Glad you liked it! Please check out our other games as they are all first-person room escape / adventure games.

content: Had to use walkthru ALOT. Got to the very end and couldnt open door. Everyone, but 8 ball agreed. Could not get it to agree????? Kept going on about train of thought... Even though train agreed with all tracks.... So l watched the walkthrough to see ending.. 😟 Glitch in game????
replyContent: Hey! Sorry about that but there are two parts to the train puzzle ( or rather, two puzzles that use the train ), so you just had one little bit left to do before the door would have opened for you.

content: I just figured out one clue with the Simon says otherwise I had no idea
replyContent: Sorry you had difficulty! We are only an email away for any help, or join our discord where we have lots of players willing to offer hints and clues. glitch.games/discord

content: I've played this game a few times now and is just as emotive, charming and clever as the first time. A very cathartic game and one of my favourites. Big thank you to Glitch.
Really clever game. A lot of games like this have predictable one dimensional clues and answers but this game has very well, unique puzzles to solve.
Fun

I absolutely love this game. I've played it 3 times now and I still find it challenging. The graphics are fantastic. The puzzles really get you thinking. All the time your playing the setting of a childhood bedroom is quite relaxing and soothing. It's a long game, value for money, one of the best in its genre in my opinion. Glitch games Please please please bring out out a sequel soon.
Very enjoyable.
some puzzles are crazy difficult but so much fun!
So much fun, wish there was a hints system but I found a walkthrough online for the couple of times i got stuck. Great game and loved all the old toys and puzzles
good but definitely could of used a hint button, had to watch walk-through for a few puzzles or I wouldn't of been able to finish the game.
I loved this game. Its a long game. I had to look threw walkthroughs a little bit as got stuck. But should definitely make more like this one!! 5*
loved it
Fantastic game I wish there is another part
Challenging! Great game!

As already noted this game is not short. But it is clever. I did look at a walkthrough several times, but usually ended up scolding myself for not seeing the answer. Lots of puzzles, some of them hard, but all of them fair. And the solutions are there to be found. Nice story and great graphics. Played flawlessly on my Samsung tablet.
Interactive and deeply immersive. Would have been 5 stars if only some of the puzzles weren't so deeply unintuitive.

Not really that "short", I have been working on this all week in my spare 
time. There is a lot going on for being just one room! LOVE the game 
controls. I love how Glitch games let you use a camera! There was just one 
thing lacking on this game...The story line was kind of not there except 
for the very beginning, and the very end of the game.

Myself and my husband are new fans of glitch games. We have played 3 now 
over the weekend. Don't judge us lol. We have loved them all but this one 
was our favorite. It was super cute

Glitch games the best! I liked this one slightly less than others (forever lost, all that remains, Alice cabin...). Because of childish grafics and also some puzzles. Some puzzles that you think you have a solution but in fact you need something more to resolve it. And also some puzzles where you need to copy a lot from the hint you find, time consuming. But still remains a nice game. Looking forward to new glitch games!
I buy everything from Glitch. Love it all (and really worth it for great time killers) so no problem supporting the developers. Keep up the great work guys!
Great

This was A Short Tale, but it was not a short game, which made me really pleased. I was totally entertained for several hours and couldn't put my phone down! By the end, I had a tear roll down my eye because it was over, but really...because it was just so moving. The teddy bear with the beautiful note to Jason. OMG. 😢😍This game is great for all ages and it certainly brought out my inner child. Really nice. You guys at Glitch Games always deliver. You put a lot of thought into your work and it shows. 👍
Although I had quite a bit of trouble on a few puzzles and had to use the walk through,  I frustratingly enjoyed it. Smart game

I have to start by stating the 4 instead of 5 stars for a game I loved, is due to what I found to be a few puzzles that were somewhat a leap, even for an avid puzzle game player. Graphics 5 star, controls 5 star. I had to turn music off, I found it too distracting, so 3 stars there. The story is 5 stars, the price is 5 stars, but that annoying fu@%$*& eight ball and that manic vacuum are maddening. 5 stars to the robot puzzle, it was my favorite. I wish I could give 4.5, but there is not that choice.
I needed help from app unwrapper when I got stalled a couple times, but overall a great puzzle game with a story😊
Doesn't seem to work? I tried speaking the voice commands
replyContent: The remote uses a voice in the game, not the microphone of your actual phone.

content: Another great mystery from Glitch
But becomes increasingly cryptic toward the end. Some bugs.

Go On TREAT yourself     Fantastic game full of real brain teasers great graphics and wonderful touches of humour worth every penny .No HO games or gratuitous violence/scary stuff but still a little edgy...in fact just a CRACKING GOOD GAME  from those MASTERS OF THE ART ...GLITCH GAMES Thank you Developers for all the love care and joined-up.thinking that went into this....so smooth running .A Short tale is truly top notch and not a glitch in sight......
Glitch games always challenging 😊
Loved every game I have played by Glitch, but this seems very short (excuse the pun) with it been called a short tale, great puzzles and graphics, just wanted it to be a bit longer
Cant,wait for more
Nice puzzles, good graphics, some funny bits. Good fun. The trick is to pace yourself... so much fun! -- thank you!
Another great game by these developers, although I really should deduct a star for the way they TEASE us with implications of NINE episodes of Forever Lost. *sigh* A girl can dream.
Should have played right away lost money cause I bought this game so lame
... and shows how it's done. Genuinely  interesting puzzles which are sometimes difficult but always fair. Plenty of 'ah ha' moments. Not finished it yet, but really enjoying it.
Awesome!!!!
Loved it
Glitch is always an instant buy.  They take great pains to make sure the final product is awesome!
My only complaint would be that I should have paced myself, for now it's done! :(
Like every Glitch game seems to be...
Money is no object when it comes to glitch games as quality is synonymous with their name! Absolutely love them! Download all of their games they are worth it!
Without playing i trust glitch games
They are hand down one of my favorite developers. Always checking twitter to see when there next game is coming out. Loved it.
